meta.description: Minimize pollution from transporting goods using motorcycles, small trucks, and large trucks.

params.name: pollution_per_trip
params.description: Pollution produced per trip for each mode

params.name: capacity_per_trip
params.description: Product capacity per trip for each mode

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips for each mode

vars.name: use_mode
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if a mode is used

objective.name: min_total_pollution
objective.expr: sum(pollution_per_trip[mode] * trips[mode] for mode in MODES)
objective.description: Minimize total pollution from all trips

constraints.name: limit_modes
constraints.description: Can only choose two modes of transportation

constraints.name: product_transport_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(capacity_per_trip[mode] * trips[mode] for mode in MODES)
constraints.description: At least 300 units of products must be transported

constraints.name: total_trip_limit
constraints.description: Total number of trips must be less than or equal to 20

constraints.name: use_mode_motorcycle
constraints.description: Link use_mode with trips for motorcycle

constraints.name: use_mode_small_truck
constraints.description: Link use_mode with trips for small truck

constraints.name: use_mode_large_truck
constraints.description: Link use_mode with trips for large truck
